body.description: Get clean teeth and fresh breath on the go with the Colgate Max Fresh Wisp Disposable Mini Toothbrush, Peppermint. This pocket-sized mini-toothbrush, brush delivers the freshness of gum and the clean of a toothbrush in one effortlessly portable device. Its built-in, sugar-free peppermint bead easily dissolves and delivers a rush of minty freshness while the bristles gently remove food and other particles. A soft pick at the handle base of this disposable toothbrush removes food particles from any hard-to-reach areas. No water or rinsing is necessary. Recycle with Terracycle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Colgate Wisp Disposable Mini Toothbrush (24 Count, Pack of 4) Colgate Wisp is your go-to brush on-the-go. Its bristles gently remove food and other particles, even around braces and other orthodontics, while the built-in freshening bead releases minty freshness. No water or rinsing is necessary, making it perfect for when you travel, or any time you’re out and about. • Provides clean of a toothbrush and freshness of gum. • No water or rinsing necessary. • Compact size. • Perfect for use with braces and other orthodontics. • Sugar free. • Available in peppermint and spearmint. • Safely upcycle through Terracycle recycling program.

Travel companion An excellent item for your travel needs. Have one handy anytime you need to clean and freshen up, no matter where you roam. Convenient one time use A brand new, fresh, mini-brush every time you need one. Compact size Fits easily in a bag or purse, so you can carry it anywhere and use it anytime. No water necessary. Safe and convenient Safely clean and freshen around braces and other orthodontics, no matter where you are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the Colgate Max Fresh Wisp Disposable Mini Toothbrushes on my travels, and they have become a non-negotiable item in my travel kit. Here's why:Convenience and Portability: The compact size of these mini toothbrushes is perfect for on-the-go dental care. They fit easily in my purse, pocket, or travel bag, making them ideal for freshening up after meals or flights.No Water or Rinsing Needed: One of the best features of the Wisp toothbrushes is that they don't require water or rinsing. The built-in freshening bead releases toothpaste gel that's just enough to brush and freshen my mouth, making them incredibly convenient when water isn't readily available.Peppermint Freshness: The peppermint flavor leaves my mouth feeling clean and refreshed. It's not overpowering but just the right intensity to give that fresh, minty breath confidence.Effective Cleaning: Despite their small size, these toothbrushes do a great job of cleaning my teeth. The bristles are soft yet effective, and the toothpick on the opposite end is handy for dislodging any food particles.Disposable and Hygienic: As disposable toothbrushes, they are a hygienic option for travel. I appreciate not having to worry about storing a wet toothbrush in my bag.Pack Size and Value: The pack of 4, with 24 toothbrushes each, offers great value and ensures that I have a sufficient supply for extended trips or daily use.Overall Experience: The Colgate Max Fresh Wisp Disposable Mini Toothbrushes have simplified maintaining my oral hygiene while traveling. They are practical, effective, and leave my mouth feeling fresh and clean. I highly recommend these to any traveler or anyone who needs a quick, convenient way to freshen up on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Minty Freshness in a Pinch: Colgate Max Fresh Wisp Mini Toothbrushes Review
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried out the Colgate Max Fresh Wisp Disposable Mini Travel Toothbrushes, and I am thoroughly impressed! These mini toothbrushes have earned a solid 5-star rating from me for their convenience, effectiveness, and refreshingly minty taste.The concept of a mini, pre-pasted toothbrush that requires no rinsing is a game-changer, especially for someone who is always on the go. Whether I'm traveling, at the office, or just out and about, these Wisps have made maintaining oral hygiene incredibly convenient. They're small enough to fit in a pocket, purse, or backpack, making them super accessible whenever I need a quick refresh.One of the standout features of these toothbrushes is their refreshing peppermint flavor. It leaves my mouth feeling clean and fresh, just like after a regular brushing. Plus, the fact that they're sugar-free and gluten-free is an added bonus, aligning well with my dietary preferences.The ability of these toothbrushes to remove surface stains and whiten teeth is another plus. It's impressive how effective they are for such a compact and disposable item. They've become a staple in my daily routine, not just for travel but also for everyday use.The single-use, disposable nature of these toothbrushes might raise environmental concerns for some, but for the convenience and hygiene they offer, especially in situations where regular brushing isn't feasible, they're an excellent choice.Colgate Max Fresh Wisp Disposable Mini Travel Toothbrushes are an excellent product for anyone looking for a quick, easy, and effective way to maintain oral hygiene on the go. Their compact size, refreshing taste, and effectiveness make them a must-have for busy lifestyles. I highly recommend them to anyone who values oral care and is frequently on the move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and effective
reviews.reviewText: I love how portable these little toothbrushes are. I am an oboe player, so I like to keep my teeth and mouth clean, especially before I play my oboe, so that I don't get food debris inside my instrument. I am often eating on the go, so these are very convenient to keep in my purse and instrument case to have handy. They make my teeth and mouth feel very clean, and there is a bit of mint in the toothbrush to freshen my breath. I like that I can use them anywhere, since they are small and don't require water or a sink. The opposite side from the brush has a pick, so you can dig stubborn morsels out of your teeth, if you need to (comes in handy especially after you've had spinach, broccoli, or an everything bagel).One of players in one of the orchestras I'm in is a dentist by day and violinist by night, and she is always happy to see me using these before rehearsal, or during the break if I have a snack.My only complaint is that I miss the zip-top the package used to have. The zip-top was so handy, and without it, they fall out of the package and are loose in the bottom of my purse (ew). So, I hope they will bring back the zip-top packaging so that I won't have to waste a ziploc bag.They are great for travel, or if you work long days. I would recommend them to people who wear braces as well. You can even pop one in your kid's lunchbox! Some teachers are stingy about giving kids bathroom breaks (don't get me started on that), so it is convenient that they can use these without a sink if they need to.

I happened to see this on TikTok. I hesitated to buy as I thought it might be ineffective or too small. I was wrong. I am 💯satisfied with the seller and product. It is a staple piece that is small enough to keep in your purse, car or travel bag. No water needed. Can be used discreetly. I have already put in my shopping cart to re-order as I don’t want to live with this!

reviews.reviewTitle: Colgate MaxFresh Wisp: The Ultimate Toothbrush for Busy Moms on-the-go!
reviews.reviewText: Hey, fellow busy moms! Let me tell you about the Colgate MaxFresh Wisp Disposable Mini Toothbrush - it's a game-changer for us on-the-go! With four packs of 24 mini toothbrushes each, it's a total of 96 count - perfect for keeping one in my bag, my kid's backpack, my office desk, and at home.This toothbrush is not only easy to use, but it also doesn't require water or rinsing, so it's perfect for those times when we're running errands or stuck in traffic. Plus, it has a peppermint flavor with a freshening bead that dissolves while using, leaving our breath feeling clean and fresh.As a busy mom, I appreciate that it has a built-in tongue scraper, which helps remove bacteria and keep our breath fresh. Also, it has soft picks that help clean hard-to-reach areas and gently remove food particles - making it an excellent option for my kids too.What's more, the toothbrush is recyclable, so I don't have to worry about adding to the landfill after using it. And did I mention that it's sugar-free? Yes, it's a great choice for my family, who are conscious of our sugar intake.Overall, the Colgate MaxFresh Wisp Disposable Mini Toothbrush is a fantastic product that has made a difference in our busy lives. It's convenient, easy to use, and environmentally friendly. So, fellow busy moms, give it a try - I promise you won't regret it!
Ci stanno anche se sarebbe preferibile che fossero confezionati singolarmente
